author: ASvyatkovskiy
body:
The branch implementing the changes in the CondFormat/DB table to accommodate the rotational APEs:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/350636/contribution/0/material/slides/0.pdf
and the changes in the muon reco to propagate the APE in the fit.
- Expected physics changes: 
  No physics changes is expected before muon APEs are enabled. In particular, no physics changes is expected from putting CondFormat + new error formats and transformations in.
  If muon APEs are enabled, we expect improvement in the q/pT pull assignment, with parameters closer to N(0,1). Some improvement of q/pT momentum resolution at high pT is expected. See:
  https://indico.cern.ch/event/333807/contribution/3/material/slides/0.pdf
  https://indico.cern.ch/event/294011/contribution/2/material/slides/0.pdf
- Expected technical performance changes:
  No significant effect on CPU performance, some increase of VSIZE and RSS with new code were observed. See:
  https://indico.cern.ch/event/344150/session/4/contribution/1/2/material/slides/1.pdf
title: Migration to 6x6 APE format needed for muon reconstruction
